bitmark:
[.interview]
[!This is a job interview with an example, model answers and line "numbers".]

===
[%a)]What was your last job?[!Please answer in one short sentence]
[@sampleSolution:I worked as a project manager.]
===
[%b)]Why did you quit your last job?[!Please answer in several short sentences]
[@sampleSolution:I was mobbed by my coworkers.]
===
[%c)]How much did you earn in your last job?[!Please use Euro as a currency][@shortAnswer]
[@sampleSolution:EUR 3'000 per month.]
===

bit.instruction: This is a job interview with an example, model answers and line "numbers".

questions.question: What was your last job?
questions.instruction: Please answer in one short sentence
questions.sampleSolution: I worked as a project manager.

questions.question: Why did you quit your last job?
questions.instruction: Please answer in several short sentences

questions.question: How much did you earn in your last job?
